translation.source: 4. The hypothesis is tested (This step requires rigour and objectivity).
translation.target: A si ni lati bẹrẹ si ṣe ariyanjiyan lori arosọ yi bọya o tọna tabi ko ri bẹẹ. (Ilana eleyi gba ki a ṣe ayẹwo fin-ni-fin-ni ti ko ni kayefi kankan).

translation.source: For transportation of oxygen and carbon(IV) oxide
responsible for protecting the body from most physical and environmental factors
translation.target: Ó sì wà fún ìdáàbòbo ara lọwọ ọpọlọpọ àwọn ewu àfojúrí ati àwọn t'àgbèègbè wa

translation.source: Naturalistic Observations: Used for phenomena that cannot be experimentally controlled.
translation.target: Iṣakiyesi oun-ayébáyé: A nlo ilana yi lati ṣewadii awọn nnkan ti a ko le fi ilana aṣewo wadi rẹ.

translation.source: An organ system is a group of anatomical structures that work together to perform a specific function or task
translation.target: Èto ẹya-ara jẹ akojọpọ awọn oriṣi iṣu-ara ti nwọn nbaraṣiṣẹ pọ fun aṣeyọri ọya kan ninu ara

translation.source: Hormones are substances released from endocrine tissue into the bloodstream where they travel to target tissue and generate a response.
translation.target: Àwọn ojera jẹ́ àwọn ẹlà tí a túsílẹ láti àwọn ìṣù ẹṣẹ́-àìlópo wá sínú òpó ẹ̀jẹ̀. Níbẹ ni wọn yóò gbé lọ sí ìṣù-ara tí a ti ní ìlò wọn láti jẹ́ èsì tí ó tọ.

translation.source: They are restricted to those experiments that nature performs for them, and must wait patiently for the right conditions to occur.
translation.target: Nitorina, nwọn ko le da ṣe aṣẹwo ju eyi ti ayanmọ nṣe fun wọn Nwọn si nilati mu suuru de igba ti àsìkò ba fun wọn laye lati ṣe ayẹwo awọn nkan ti o ṣe wọn ni kayefi.

translation.source: exchange oxygen and carbon dioxide and then deliver the waste-rich blood to the veins
translation.target: Wọn a sì ṣe pàṣípààrọ òyì-iná yi pẹ̀lú òyì-èédú. Wọn a sì ṣe ìfiránṣẹ ẹ̀jẹ̀ tó kún fún ẹgbin sí àwọn ìṣọ̀n-ẹ̀jẹ̀ àbọ

translation.source: Protects the body's internal tissues and organs
translation.target: Ó nṣe ìdáàbò bo àwọn ìṣù àti ẹ̀yà inú ara

translation.source: For transportation of vital substances around the body
translation.target: Fún àgbéká àwọn èròjà kòṣeémáni yí ara ka

translation.source: The Nervous System (brain, spinal cord, nerves)
the body could not function without the cooperation of all of its organ systems
translation.target: Ara ẹda ko si lee gbeṣẹ lai si ifọwọsowọpọ awọn eto awọn ẹya-ara yi

translation.source: veins return oxygen-depleted blood back to the heart and lungs
translation.target: Àwọn ìṣọ̀n-ẹ̀jẹ̀ àbọ nṣe ìdápadà ẹ̀jẹ̀ alòyì-iná lọ sí ọkàn àti ẹdọforó

translation.source: Act as a receptor for touch, pressure, pain, heat, and cold
translation.target: Ó njẹ kí a náání ìfarakàn, ìfúnpọ, ẹdùn, ìgbóná àti otútù
